meanings.definition: Inclined or likely to do something excessively or too easily.
meanings.sent1: She is overapt to eat too much candy.
meanings.sent2: He is overapt to help others without being asked.
meanings.sent3: The dog is overapt to chase its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The toddler is overapt to explore every nook and cranny of the house.
meanings.sent5: The student is overapt to raise their hand for every question in class.

meanings.sent1: The overapt puppy eagerly wagged its tail at every visitor.
meanings.sent2: She was overapt to volunteer for every task that came up.
meanings.sent3: The overapt child eagerly finished all their vegetables before dessert.
meanings.sent4: The overapt fan eagerly waited in line for hours to meet their favorite singer.
meanings.sent5: He was overapt to start his new project with great enthusiasm.
